page.description: Get the position in the file.
page.discussion: The .POS_GET() method returns the Position in the file of the file pointer.
page.example: dim file_pointer as P file_pointer = file.open("c:\autoexec.bat",FILE_RO_SHARED) file_pointer.read(20) 'read 20 bytes pos = file_pointer.pos_get() 'pos should be 20
